short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RSS/ATOM reader. No server backend required, all parsing is done in browser. No synchronization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RSS Reader is extension for reading RSS and ATOM news feeds. It does not require any server to work. Storage is somewhat limited, currently to 5 MB so that RR does not actually store the feeds data.
